lead_paragraph: SOLOMON--Alan, beloved father, brother, grandfather, uncle, passed away peacefully on Sunday, June 19, surrounded by loved ones. Alan was the loving father of David, Andy and Jeff; adoring brother to Steve, doting grandfather of Katie, Carrie, Samantha and Lyla; and, caring uncle of Amy, Ken and Emily. Alan was the loving husband for fifty years to Sandra, who died in 2010. He was lucky to find the love and companionship of Ellen in his last five years. Alan took great joy from spending time with his family, especially his granddaughters. Alan was a passionate life-long lover of food and wine. He taught his sons and granddaughters the pleasures of a delicious cheese, paired with a hearty red wine. Alan was also a longtime student of the market, excited by business and finance for his entire life. He also enjoyed being involved in his local community, chairing for several years the Armonk Art Fair. And he was an original founder of Woodlands Community Temple. Alan was a friend to many, a mentor to his sons and a generous and affectionate grandfather. He will be deeply missed by all those who were lucky to know him. Funeral services will be held at 12 noon on Tuesday, June 21 at Riverside Memorial Chapel in Mount Vernon, NY. In lieu of flowers, Alan's family will be grateful for any donations made in his memory to Prostate Cancer Foundation (PCF.org), 1250 4th Street, Santa Monica, CA 90401 (1-800-757-2873). 1/3
